message.subject: New topic notification - "there mainly for performance reasons and also to give it today's look."
message.body:
Hello acrombies,

You are receiving this notification because you are watching the forum
"Rainmeter News" at "Rainmeter Forums". This forum has received a new topic
by skylove since your last visit, "there mainly for performance reasons and
also to give it today's look.". You can use the following link to view the
forum, no more notifications will be sent until you visit the forum.

https://forum.rainmeter.net/viewforum.php?f=13

If you no longer wish to watch this forum you can either click the
"Unsubscribe forum" link found in the forum above, or by clicking the
following link:

https://forum.rainmeter.net/viewforum.php?uid=43092&f=13&unwatch=forum

-- 
Thanks,
The Rainmeter Team
